Package client

Class SocketClient

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
client.Client
client.SocketClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientAskNotify, ClientHandler, Serializable, Remote
public class SocketClient extends Client
Extends the Client class Generated when the user wants to communicate with socket Client-Server communication performed through socket TCP connections
See Also:
